name: Go Fish by Webfoot
description:
Play the classic card game Go Fish on your computer. Compete against the computer's AI players for a real challenge. The object of Go Fish is to make “books”, four cards of the same value. At the end of the game, the player who has the most “books” is the winner. Enjoy a soothing soundtrack and smooth animated gameplay. Includes detailed in-game rules and help. Classic card game fun for all ages!

Features

* Real Go Fish rules
* Play against the computer AI
* Fast animated play
* Detailed game rules included
* Soothing soundtrack
